name: Tropical Fish
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.7b Details Title Tropical Fish Model No. TF-104 Series Game & Watch ( New Wide Screen ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date July 8, 1985 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Prevent pet fish from falling to the floor and being eaten by a hungry cat in this wide screen edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series of handheld electronic games.

Gameplay

Energetic tropical fish jump out from their fish tanks. On the floor a hungry cat awaits. Catch the fish to save them from falling to the floor and being eaten.

Move the character left and right to position the fish bowl under the falling fish so they can be caught in the bowl.

At first, the fish jump slowly. As the score increases, the speed and number of fish will increase. In Game A the fish will jump only from left to right. In Game B the fish can jump to the left or to the right and they can jump out from either tank.

A point is scored for each fish caught in the fish bowl or returned to their tanks.

A miss is scored for each fish dropped to floor and eaten. Three misses and the game is over!

Tips

The speed and number of fish temporarily decreases for every 100 points scored providing a short break before the action picks up again.

Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
